about_the_game:
Overview: Enter the surreal world of Hunting Shadows, a thrilling third-person platformer where reality bends and every corner reveals new challenges. You play as Seraphine, an adventurous explorer who stumbles upon a portal to another dimension, a place where the laws of physics are twisted and the environment itself is alive with danger.

In this mind-bending realm, you'll navigate through floating islands, gravity-defying landscapes, and eerie ruins that seem to shift and change as you explore. Each level presents a unique set of puzzles that test your wits, requiring you to manipulate the environment, time, and even your own abilities to progress. Solve ancient riddles to unlock pathways and uncover the secrets of this mysterious dimension.

But it’s not just the environment that stands in your way. Sinister creatures born from the void lurk in the shadows, ready to strike. From agile, shadowy figures that stalk you from the darkness to massive, otherworldly beasts that tower over you, every enemy demands a different strategy to defeat. Use a combination of agility, combat skills, and quick thinking to outmaneuver these monstrous foes and survive the perils of this alien world.

As you delve deeper into the dimension, you'll discover powerful artifacts that grant you new abilities, allowing you to access previously unreachable areas and face even greater challenges. But be warned: the further you go, the more the dimension warps around you, distorting reality in ways you never thought possible.

Hunting Shadows combines the thrill of platforming with intricate puzzles and intense combat, all set in a vividly imagined world that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Are you ready to step through the rift and face the unknown?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 with Platform Update for Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5-2550K, 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670 | Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 12
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 version 14393.102 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770, 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or GeForce GTX 1060 | Radeon R9 290X or Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 12
